name: PHAssetMediaSubtype
desc: Constants identifying specific variations of asset media, such as panorama or screenshot photos and time lapse or high frame rate video.

items.name: init(rawValue: UInt)
items.desc: Initializes a media subtype from a raw value.

items.name: static var photoPanorama: PHAssetMediaSubtype
items.desc: The asset is a large-format panorama photo.

items.name: static var photoHDR: PHAssetMediaSubtype
items.desc: The asset is a High Dynamic Range photo.

items.name: static var photoScreenshot: PHAssetMediaSubtype
items.desc: The asset is an image captured with the deviceâ€™s screenshot feature.

items.name: static var photoLive: PHAssetMediaSubtype
items.desc: The asset is a Live Photo that includes movement and sounds from the moments just before and after its capture.

items.name: static var videoStreamed: PHAssetMediaSubtype
items.desc: The asset is a video whose contents are always streamed over a network connection.

items.name: static var videoHighFrameRate: PHAssetMediaSubtype
items.desc: The asset is a high-frame-rate video.

items.name: static var videoTimelapse: PHAssetMediaSubtype
items.desc: The asset is a time-lapse video.

items.name: static var photoDepthEffect: PHAssetMediaSubtype
items.desc: The asset is a photo captured with the Camera app's Portrait mode depth effect.
